column1: #Text=is a historic small town in North Ayrshire , Scotland .
#Text=In September 2006 , West Kilbride won First Prize in the " Enterprising Britain 2006 " award , for its " Craft Town Scotland " initiative .

column1: #Text=The A78 - picturesque coastal route , wending through North Ayrshire .
#Text=Stagecoach and Shuttle Buses both provide a regular service ;
#Text=Regular passenger trains from Largs to Glasgow Central Station ;
#Text=Prestwick Airport and Glasgow Airport are convenient .
#Text=West Kilbride Museum , West Kilbride Village Hall , 1 Arthur Street .
#Text=Visitor centre , and tours of the power station are available if UK citizens book 3 weeks in advance , ( 4+ weeks for foreigners ) .
#Text=The AGR ( Advanced Gas cooled Reactor ) power station has been generating since 1976 , and is scheduled to operate until 2023 .
#Text=The older Magnox Hunterston A next door operated from 1957 to 1990 .
#Text=West Kilbride Golf Club , Fullarton Drive , Seamill .
#Text=This well-respected 18-hole links course offers many challenges to test even the seasoned golfer .
#Text=The fabulous view of Arran makes a wonderful backdrop to your game - and you may find it hard not to take your eye off the ball ! Relax in the clubhouse afterwards .
#Text=Kirktonhall Glen . is a woodland walkway leading from West Kilbride to Seamill , gifted to West Kilbride in 1924 by Robert Barr .
#Text=Through it flows the Kilbride Burn which enters the Firth of Clyde at Seamill .
#Text=Craft Town Scotland art gallery and museum , The Barony Centre , 50 Main Street , ☏ +441294829179 .
#Text=West Kibride has recently been dubbed " The UK 's Capital of Enterprise " because of its pioneering Craft Town Scotland initiative .
#Text=Its growing colony of top-class craftspeople and retail shops deserves your support .
#Text=Now is the time to invest in original and stylish works of art - for example , from Silversmith Marion Kane ; Nicola Beattie , candle-maker ; and many others .
#Text=A Gift Tae Gie , 45 Main Street , ☏ +441294829509 . offers a fantastic array of gifts , toys , cards and interior accessories for all ages .
#Text=Glenbryde , 31 Ritchie Street , ☏ +441294829839 . specialises in the sale of quality clocks and barometers .
#Text=Various Indian and Chinese take-aways in the centre of town
#Text=delightful coffee-shop in the heart of West Kilbride
#Text=Seamill Hydro Hotel and Resort , 39 Ardrossan Rd , Seamill , ☏ +441294822217 .
#Text=beautiful restaurant with a la carte and table d'hote menus .
#Text=The Catch At Fins Restaurant , Fencefoot Farm , Fairlie , KA29 0EG .
#Text=Thu - Sat : noon - 3PM , 6PM - 9PM ; Sun : 12PM - 3PM . award-winning seafood restaurant mains from £12 .
#Text=The Kilbride Tavern and the King 's Arms are typical Scottish pubs , located in the heart of West Kilbride .
#Text=Best known for the wee deli pate & soups .
#Text=Carlton Seamill Bed & Breakfast , 53 Ardrossan Road , Seamill , ☏ +441294822075 , ✉ carlton@westkilbride.net .
#Text=Isle of Bute ( Rothesay and Mount Stuart )
#Text=Loch Lomond and The Trossachs National Park
#Text=Clyde Muirshiel Regional Park ; City of Glasgow
#Text=Robert Burns Heritage Trail ; Kelburn Castle and Country Estate
#Text=Important golf courses within easy reach - for example , Royal Troon and Prestwick
